achievements: Known for his reporting from communist China during the early 20th century.
Author of 'Red Star Over China', a seminal work on Mao Zedong and the Chinese Communist Party.
Identified the link between cholera outbreaks and contaminated water.
Protagonist of the fantasy novel series 'A Song of Ice and Fire' by George R.R. Martin.
Known for his heroism, honor, and resilience.
